title: Pialral chawlhna tha tak a awm
lyrics:
Pialral chawlhna tha tak a awm,
Khi ram nuam takah khian;
Khawdur leh zan khaw thim a ral hnuan,
Ni eng reng chu a awm.

Khitah khian min tawk langin,
Chumi tukah khawfingchah eng leh varin;
Khitah khian min tawk langin,
Khi lui ral ram mawiah khian min tawk langin.

Khawpui eng mawi tak chu a awm,
A nawm sawi hleih theihh loh;
Tu pawh lut apiangin Lal an hmu hlawm,
A hmaah an awm fo.

Lalber lukhum vana awm chu,
Isuan a khumtir ang;
Dawhthei taka a lo kal nghaktu leh
A hming chawimawi a piang.

Chutichuan, thih ni thleng pawhin,
Zawh hlen hram hram zel la;
Nunna kawngkaa luh theihna tur, ram
Ni tla ngai lovah khian.
